name: Vitarem
body:
# Vitarem ![Build status](https://api.travis-ci.org/ssgonchar/vitarem.svg?branch=master):rocket:

> **Vita** (Latin. _life_). **Rem** (Latin. _busines_) - this is simple and usefull web platform for real-time based apps. 


## Documentation

You can find documentation in [:books:WIKI](https://github.com/ssgonchar/vitarem/wiki).

## Installation instruction

1. git clone https://github.com/ssgonchar/vitarem.git
1. composer install
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
